website_summaries.verdict: Similar to other previous models, the Etnies Fader LS is a skate shoe that accommodates a comfortable experience. Up for grabs at a very affordable price, it has a classic and simplistic look and yet aesthetically appealing. It is a bang for the buck as the footwear offers the perfect combination of comfort, style, and performance that anyone wants.  Albeit a few had reported it as a bit snug on the toe area, buyers still chose to own a pair and hoped that they could soon achieve a more comfortable fit once the upper has stretched out.
pros: The Etnies Fader LS has a stylish silhouette
It has a great looking and nice design, attested by some of the buyers
A good number of customers mentioned that the footwear offers a comfortable fit especially to those with more than an average-width size foot
This pair of Etnies kicks is available at a very budget-friendly price
Several reviewers lauded the shoe’s durability
Like other Etnies models, this iteration has an amazing quality that it could take a beating and still last a while
This footwear is lightweight, commented by some purchasers
cons: The shoe runs small as per several wearers
Some had to replace a half size bigger to get a comfier fit
A couple of testers complained concerning the shoe having a tad narrow fit on the toe area
A user groaned against the plastic under the fabric at the back of the shoe
He is so disappointed that the plastic cuts into his Achilles heel

customer_reviews.title: Etnies sizes are (maybe) small than UK sizes
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Generally good quality (outer) - Stitches and material doesnt look cheap - Purchased at £16 - Very good design Cons - Etnies size is too small. I bought UK 5.5 and it felt like UK4.5 as front part was too narrow - Inner sole of right shoe is clearly bigger (see photo) and they tried to unsuccessfully fit it, which ends up ruining it with glue near the logo Overall I like it, but wont be using it because of size. I might try bigger sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Deadbeat88

customer_reviews.title: I did like these shoes while they lasted
customer_reviews.text: I did like these shoes while they lasted, but unfortunately that wasn't very long. I bought them in early January and they were on sale for £16.50. I've thrown them out already as they fell apart after just a few months. At their reduced price of £16.50 i'd call it a decent purchase but when they're on a full price for £55 i'd rather spend that on some more long-lasting shoes!
customer_reviews.author: jmdavison1

customer_reviews.title: Look really tidy and comfortable too, the cushioning on the soles is good
customer_reviews.text: Look really tidy and comfortable too, the cushioning on the soles is good, maybe not walk 20 miles good, but good enough for me for day to day use. Padding around the sides and back of the foot is also good, no complaints so far. Like the design, nice and simple and they seem well made, Etnies always seem to last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Adam D

customer_reviews.title: Look poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: My son didn't even try these on, the description said they were nubuck leather uppers with manmade inners and they were in fact all manmade. They have no padding like previous Etnies and looked cheap. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Tam72

customer_reviews.title: cant say how much i love these
customer_reviews.text: I skateboard all the time and they have lasted so long and still going strong. look sick and clean by hand simply. Throw me back to my old school days. would consider buying a few pairs for years to come, cant say how much i love these
customer_reviews.author: Lets be honest...

customer_reviews.title: Not very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I hadn't noticed that these were the 'Ls' variety and that "Modernized version of a long time etnies classic" really means "no padding, no comfort". They're lightweight and work adequately as slippers but they provide little cushioning and standing or walking in them for any significant period is not much fun. Next time I'll go back to the traditional Faders.
customer_reviews.author: B. Sizer

customer_reviews.title: Good Bargain.
customer_reviews.text: These are great trainers albeit a bit on the small/narrow side but not so much as to make them uncomfortable. The sole is a bit thinner than other Etnies trainers that I've got but again not so much that it's uncomfortable. These were on offer when I got them so for the price I paid they were a fab bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Origin

customer_reviews.title: Good but...not exactly as pictured
customer_reviews.text: These shoes arrived on time, are comfortable and are true to size. However, one star deducted for not having the red colour on the outer side as pictured on the product page. The shoes were all black, no red outline relief. But we've had them before, for teens and they wore well and lasted.
customer_reviews.author: C.H: Spain

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes at a great price. Etnies always fit well and these were no exception.
customer_reviews.author: Juwie P

customer_reviews.title: best trainers i've ever had its my second pair you ...
customer_reviews.text: best trainers i've ever had its my second pair you can stick them adidas were the sun dont shine there for muppets like that noel gallegher lol
customer_reviews.author: john brookes

customer_reviews.title: ... is on the small and tight side so would recommend adding 1/2 a size to what you would normally
customer_reviews.text: Lovely style trainers however fitting is on the small and tight side so would recommend adding 1/2 a size to what you would normally wear
customer_reviews.author: Shelley F.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and awesome
customer_reviews.text: They look great in real life. I got them for only 24 pounds, so very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: anony-geek

customer_reviews.title: Bit drunk
customer_reviews.text: Got paid , woohoo love etnies ,just like wearing a sofa on your feets , cant skate for toffee but least i look cool
customer_reviews.author: douglas russell

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time but with a stain on the tip
customer_reviews.author: dready420

customer_reviews.title: fit nicely & look
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my son for school, fit nicely & look smart
customer_reviews.author: claire

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: These are comfortable, however I got a hole in the sole after about three months. Honeycomb sole meant I got a wet foot whenever it rained.
customer_reviews.author: Sean and the Mechanics

customer_reviews.title: Poor
customer_reviews.text: No problem with seller but the shoes are rubbish. They are a completely different shoe to my previous Faders. Quality has taken a nose dive and have only lasted 3 months. Will never buy Etnies again.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Grimm1

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes won't last.
customer_reviews.text: Good shoes buuuut they won't last.they got me through 3 months. Trashed after that tbh
customer_reviews.author: Shaytan Kaboom

customer_reviews.title: Nice .. trainers... very fast delivery ..
customer_reviews.text: I love these .. Good price .. very fast delivery..
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Like them!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoes, very comfortable and look nice. Just remember to order a size larger whenever you buy any Etnies shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Marcel

customer_reviews.title: like not much sole to them
customer_reviews.text: They are okay. Feel kinda hollow, like not much sole to them. Comfortable enough, but not fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Same shoes for fraction price. Cant go wrong. Etnies are always well made
customer_reviews.author: Ana Nares Pearce

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: If you like this style of shoe they are very durable and well built.
customer_reviews.author: MR C.

customer_reviews.title: great trainers
customer_reviews.text: My husband only wears these type of shoes. They are the same size across the board so if you are one size in one you will be the same in another in my experience.
customer_reviews.author: KerryUK

customer_reviews.title: otherwise good all
customer_reviews.text: As described, tad on tight side, otherwise good all round
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL G GOULD

customer_reviews.title: Incredible
customer_reviews.text: Just as expected. Had to relace; im OCD about that, but otherwise fantastic shoes. So comfortable; we'll see how durable they prove to be.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver W

customer_reviews.title: The rest if fine.
customer_reviews.text: it's quite small and too tight on the top for the right shoe compared to left shoe. The rest if fine.
customer_reviews.author: Maxie.Mazow

customer_reviews.title: WORST ETNIES EVER DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: WORST ETNIES EVER.!!! PLASTIC SOLES WHEN ADVERTISED AS GUM.!!! SLIPPERY AS HELL.!! DO NOT BUY THESE I BELIEVE THEY ARE FAKE.!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: Comfy shoe which is why I got them again, but the latest pair have had it after less than 6 months. The first pair lasted 18 months of heavy use.
customer_reviews.author: J Seaman

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: My grandson chose these because they have style and yet serve as a hard wearing pair of school or leisure shoes.
customer_reviews.author: musicman

product_meta.title: Etnies Men's Fader Ls Skateboarding Shoes
product_meta.description: Etnies fader ls features die-cut eva insole, modernized version of a long time etnies classic, egg-crate midsole construction, blucher toe and eyestay.
